questions.text: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as one of the RAI (Responsible AI) principles in the slides?
According to the lecture, how many Executive Orders on AI were issued?
What does PEMAT stand for in the context of healthcare video assessment?
According to the presentation, which domains need AI emergency response capabilities?
Which of the following statement(s) is true regarding the development and implementation of AI systems?
options: Policy considerations and technical details are equally important
Technical details alone are sufficient for effective AI development
Policy considerations are only important in few countries
AI systems do not require any policy or ethical considerations
questions.correctAnswer: Policy considerations and technical details are equally important

questions.text: In the suffix attacks, what is the vulnerability related to?
What type of multi-disciplinary approaches are required for AI evaluation?
options: Social science, engineering, and computer science approaches
questions.correctAnswer: Social science, engineering, and computer science approaches

questions.text: Based on the lecture content: From a mathematical perspective, which of the following is not considered a major problem in AI today, compared among others?
According to the lecture, who is primarily responsible for self-regulation in the context of AI and technology?
options: Only the organizations with more than 1 crore turnover

questions.text: What is the six-step process for adopting a systems approach to fairness?
options: Define, Measure, Understand, Improve, Mitigate, Monitor
Design, Build, Test, Deploy, Evaluate, Maintain
Plan, Execute, Review, Adjust, Scale, Optimize
Collect, Process, Analyze, Model, Validate, Implement
questions.correctAnswer: Define, Measure, Understand, Improve, Mitigate, Monitor

questions.text: In the Accuracy vs. Disparity chart, what represents the Ideal model?
